title: The Cigar Authority's Aficionado Predictions
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority's Aficionado Predictions
description: The Cigar Authority pulls out the crystal ball as we try and predict the Top 10 Cigars by Cigar Aficionado. Join the #1 Cigar Podcast with over 1 million downloads this calendar year as we are joined by Victor Vitale of Legacy Brands. We also have the Classic 3-Way, Cigar News, Old Fart Freddy in the Aging Room and we get Debonaire with Chuck Morrison before taking  a trip in to the Asylum.Join one of the top Cigar Blogs around on the Number 1 Podcast!﻿
